comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Hi Cotinis: Thank you for the information about the date. March 23, 1913 was Easter according to www.searchforancestors.com/utility/easter.html so this image relates to other 1913 Easter images in the Bain Collection.

comment.author: 46317563@N04
comment._content: Joseph W. Harriman, President of Harriman National Bank and Trust Co., juggled depositor's funds and attempted suicide to avoid arrest. He was convicted and sent to prison. A closer view of the clock: digitalgallery.nypl.org/nypldigital/id?482743
